name: Rockee
description:
'Come gather resources in a hyper casual exploration game, where you play as the intrepid mining bot Rockee, stuck in a loop of endless satisfying self-improvement, exploring low poly mine shafts.'

This work was created for an 'interaction and usability module' for University. My main focus with this game was on the user interface and experience rather than the gameplay itself. 

It is not intended to be a fully finished game, more a showcase of design and implementation.

There is no save state between game sessions in this build!
